name: Calendar Agent
description: An agent that helps users manage and query their Google Calendar. Supports searching, creating, updating, moving, and deleting events, as well as retrieving calendar info and current datetime.

skills.name: Search Events
skills.description: Search for events in the user's calendar based on time, date, or keywords.
examples: Do I have any meetings next Monday?
Find all events with 'project' in the title this week.

skills.name: Create Event
skills.description: Create a new event in the user's calendar.
examples: Schedule a meeting with John at 10am on Friday.
Add a badminton match tomorrow from 19:00 to 20:00.

skills.name: Update Event
skills.description: Update details of an existing event in the user's calendar.
examples: Change the location of my lunch appointment to Cafe ABC.

skills.name: Move Event
skills.description: Move an event to a different calendar.
examples: Move my meeting with John to my work calendar.
Transfer the dentist appointment to my family calendar.

skills.name: Delete Event
skills.description: Delete an event from the user's calendar.
examples: Remove my meeting with John tomorrow.
Delete my dentist appointment next Wednesday.

skills.name: Get Calendars Info
skills.description: Retrieve information about the user's calendars.
examples: Show details of my work calendar.

skills.name: Get Current Datetime
skills.description: Get the current date and time.
